definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: He requited my kindness with cruel words.
sentences.chinese: 他竟以咒骂来回报我的善待。

sentences.english: Treat the poor people are the virtues of the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 善待贫困人是众先知的美德。

sentences.english: Try to maintain your animal-friendly eating habits when you go on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 尝试在放假时养成吃善待动物的农场出品的食物吧。

sentences.english: However, for luxurious softness, you can't beat the texture of sheepskin.
sentences.chinese: 然而为了保持绝对的柔软度，请善待的你羊皮手套。

sentences.english: You can count on being well-treated, as long as you behave yourself.
sentences.chinese: 只要你行为得当，保证就会得到善待。

sentences.english: The main reason for the ecological crisis is that man can't do well with nature.
sentences.chinese: 因为造成生态危机的主要原因是人们不能善待自然。

sentences.english: He requited my kindness only with cruel words.
sentences.chinese: 他竟以咒骂来回报我的善待。

sentences.english: Joyce says these McQuillanland authorities are not known for being kind to lawbreakers.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯说他们不会善待犯法者。

sentences.english: Do good to Zion in your good pleasure, building up the walls of Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 求你随你的美意善待锡安，建造耶路撒冷的城墙。

sentences.english: Osama asked. “Duty to God and to your country, and to help others.”
sentences.chinese: 奥萨马问，“忠于上帝和祖国，以善待人。”

sentences.english: Do good, O Lord , to those who are good, to those who are upright in heart.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，求你善待那些为善，和心里正直的人。

sentences.english: Do you make a special effort to get along amiably with his mother or other relatives?
sentences.chinese: 你是否尽力去善待他的母亲和亲人？

sentences.english: Rule No.11: Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them.
sentences.chinese: 善待卑微的人，你可终其一生都在为其工作。

sentences.english: Ruth, a foreign-born widow, gets into the story by showing kindness to her mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 外邦的寡妇路得以善待她的婆婆出现在故事中。

sentences.english: They don't think that they're kind to lawbreakers.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为那些官员不会善待犯法者。

sentences.english: TETH. Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O LORD, according unto thy word.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，你向来是照你的话善待仆人。

definition: to place great importance on/to treasure
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to show concern and care for
to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate
